attributes.action: (Re)open a rail line to Consett, County Durham
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Consett is a town of 30 000, with no rail link. There are many former rail lines which could easily be reopened, providing a direct link to Newcastle and long distance services. This would reduce traffic congestion and help revitalize the town.

We demand a rail service, and not a response along the lines of "the governments white paper envisages increasing capacity rather than reopening lines..."
